job_to_be_done.task: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o Oil for frying 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. 
o Form mixture into flat cakes. 
o Fry in hot oil until golden. 
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm. 
 
Banchan 
 
Ingredients: 
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi 
 
Instructions: 
o Prepare each side dish separately. 
o Arrange on small plates. 
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal. 
 
Banh Beo 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup rice flour 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 1/2 cup coconut milk 
o 1/4 cup shrimp 
o 1/4 cup green onions 
o 1/4 cup fried shallots 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon sugar 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, salt, and sugar to form a batter. 
o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set. 
o Sauté chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked. 
o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots. 
o Serve with dipping sauce. 
 
Banh Xeo 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup rice flour 
o 1/2 cup coconut milk 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 1/2 pound shrimp 
o 1/2 pound pork 
o 1 small onion 
o 1/2 cup bean sprouts 
o 1/4 cup green onions 
o 1/4 cup cilantro 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric

o 1 small onion 
o 2 tomatoes 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro 
o 1 teaspoon minced garlic 
 
Instructions: 
o Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl. 
o Mash the avocados with a fork. 
o Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic. 
o Mix well and serve immediately. 
 
Gurkensalat (Cucumber Salad) 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 cucumbers 
o 1/4 cup sour cream 
o 2 tablespoons vinegar 
o 1 tablespoon sugar 
o 1 teaspoon dill 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
 
Instructions: 
o Slice cucumbers thinly. 
o Mix sour cream, vinegar, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl. 
o Toss cucumbers with the dressing. 
o Serve chilled. 
 
Gyeran Jjim 
 
Ingredients: 
o 4 eggs 
o 1 cup water 
o 1/4 cup green onions 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil 
 
Instructions: 
o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions. 
o Pour mixture into a heatproof bowl. 
o Steam for 10-15 minutes until set. 
o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm. 
 
Harira 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup lentils 
o 1/2 cup chickpeas 
o 1 small onion

• 
Serve immediately. 
 
 
 
Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup cottage cheese 
• 
1/4 cup diced cucumber 
• 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
• 
1/4 cup diced bell pepper 
• 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. 
• 
Season with salt and pepper. 
• 
Serve immediately. 
 
 
 
 
Almond Butter and Apple Slices 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 apple, sliced 
• 
2 tablespoons almond butter 
Instructions: 
• 
Spread almond butter on each apple slice. 
• 
Serve immediately.

 
In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and cumin. 
Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour. 
 
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 
 
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 
 
Stir in tomato puree and simmer for 20 minutes. 
 
Add heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for another 10 minutes. 
 
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan. 
 
 
 
Chili Con Carne 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound ground beef 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans, drained 
 
1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 
 
1/4 cup tomato paste 
 
1 cup beef broth 
 
1 tablespoon chili powder 
 
1 teaspoon cumin 
 
1 teaspoon paprika 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
 
Shredded cheese and sour cream for garnish 
Instructions: 
 
In a large pot, cook ground beef with diced onion and garlic over medium heat until 
browned. 
 
Stir in kidney beans, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, chili powder, cumin, and 
paprika. 
 
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. 
 
Season with salt and pepper. 
 
Serve hot, garnished with shredded cheese and sour cream. 
 
 
 
Gnocchi with Sage Butter 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound potato gnocchi 
 
1/4 cup butter 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
8 fresh sage leaves 
 
1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions:

 
1 small onion, sliced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 piece ginger, sliced 
 
2 star anise 
 
1 cinnamon stick 
 
1 tablespoon fish sauce 
 
1 tablespoon soy sauce 
 
8 ounces rice noodles 
 
Fresh basil, cilantro, bean sprouts, lime wedges, and sliced jalapeños for garnish 
Instructions: 
 
In a large pot, bring beef broth to a boil. 
 
Add sliced onion, minced garlic, sliced ginger, star anise, and cinnamon stick. 
 
Simmer for 30 minutes. 
 
Stir in fish sauce and soy sauce. 
 
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. 
 
Divide noodles and thinly sliced beef among bowls. 
 
Pour hot broth over the top. 
 
Garnish with fresh basil, cilantro, bean sprouts, lime wedges, and sliced jalapeños. 
 
Serve immediately. 
 
 
 
Yakitori 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces 
 
1/4 cup soy sauce 
 
1/4 cup mirin 
 
1/4 cup sake 
 
2 tablespoons sugar 
 
Bamboo skewers 
 
Sliced green onions for garnish 
Instructions: 
 
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar. 
 
Marinate chicken pieces in the mixture for at least 30 minutes. 
 
Thread chicken onto bamboo skewers. 
 
Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 
 
Grill chicken, brushing with marinade, until cooked through. 
 
Garnish with sliced green onions and serve. 
 
 
 
Zucchini Noodles with Pesto 
Ingredients: 
 
4 zucchinis, spiralized into noodles
